name: Martin OVALLE-GARCIA, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES; Joel Silva-Duran, petitioner, v. United States.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petitions for writs of certiorari granted. Judgments vacated, and cases remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Esquivel-Quintana v. Sessions, 581 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 1562, --- L.E.2d ---- (2017).
casebody.head_matter:
Martin OVALLE-GARCIA, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES;
Joel Silva-Duran, petitioner,
v.
United States.
No. 16-8455.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 5, 2017.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petitions for writs of certiorari granted. Judgments vacated, and cases remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Esquivel-Quintana v. Sessions, 581 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 1562, --- L.E.2d ---- (2017).
